page.title: 16DANCING
page.content: Several children in the village learn to dance, usually by attending{ {dancing lessons}held in one of the nearby towns and villages. {Ballet}classes are held at a{School {of Dancing}in the next village, and some of the Bulphan children attend. One or two children are learning to{ {tap dance}as well. Lots of children in school like to take part in the latest{dance crazes} that are popular in{discos}at the moment. There are two types of{disco {dance}in fashion just now -{body {popping}and{break dancing.}You use the whole of your body for these dances. In{body popping}there are many sharp, angular movements whereas in{ {break dancing}many of the movements are more fluid. One of the difficult moves is when you lie on the floor and move along like a{wave}or{caterpillar.
